biotools.summary: PTMViz is a tool for analyzing and visualizing histone post translational modification data. PTMViz is a histone post tranliastional modification analysis tool built within the shiny graphical user interface of the R programming language. Within PTMViz the user can create figures and scrutinize thier data using one of two functions: Protein) The protein function lets the user view thier data in an interactive volcano plot and heatmap as well as a provided data table of its differential analysis results, and PTM) The PTM function will return an interactive data table, barachart figures, and a differential analysis of the provided histone ptm data.
